channel.title: Health on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Health on Blog

item.title: No. Don't put your back into it.
item.description: Note: I don’t know everything about how to prevent back pain from work, I am no expert. This is simply my learnings from my experience. If you disagree with anything written in here, or feel like I am misinformed, please leave a comment on the post. My name is Tom. I am 26 years old, I am 6 ft 1 inches tall, and I weigh 86 kilograms (with 0.8 kilograms added on due to too much cheese at christmas).
